GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
powerpc/xive: Fix refcount leak in xive_spapr_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 65f11ccdd746e0e7f0b469cc989ba43d4f30ecfe, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit eac1e731b59ee3b5f5e641a7765c7ed41ed26226. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: powerpc/xive: Fix refcount leak in xive_spapr_init
